name: Sorry we don't have any castles
name_original: Sorry we don't have any castles
description:
Have you ever wanted to visit a tiny village? Do you have some questions in need of answers? Some very specific questions perhaps? About love? And war?
Come down to our tiny village! Theres not much to do, but plenty of conversations to be had! But we really are sorry we don't have any castles.

Programmer: 
Espen Haftorn Gonzalez

Artist:
Silas Gystad  

Writing: 
Silas Gystad
Espen Haftorn Gonzalez

Music:
Retro Dreamscape by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org) 
Found at: http://www.twinmusicom.org/song/283/retro-dreamscape

CONTROLS: 
WASD - move
MOUSE - look around
E/LMB - talk 
Escape - quit game
